title: The Psychedelic Renaissance - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/1/20
itunes:title: The Psychedelic Renaissance - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 12/1/20
description:
George Noory and author Martin Ball explore his work advocating for the increased use of psychedelic drugs as a form of therapy for mental issues, what would happen if all drugs were legalized and how to safely use drugs for medical purposes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
